trans-unit.source: An XML element that contains a unique network address that a client uses to communicate with a service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 包含客户端使用与服务终结点进行通信的唯一网络地址的 XML 元素。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.EndpointAddressElementBase"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the URI for the endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置终结点的 URI。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> that identifies the network location for the endpoint.
Copies the content of a specified configuration element to this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的配置元素的内容复制到此配置元素。

trans-unit.source: The configuration element to be copied over.
trans-unit.target: 要通过复制的配置元素。

trans-unit.source: source is or empty.
Gets the collection of address headers for the endpoints that the builder can create.
trans-unit.target: 获取生成器可以创建的终结点的地址标头的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AddressHeaderCollectionElement"></xref> that contains address information for the endpoint.
Gets the identity for the endpoint.
An <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.IdentityElement"></xref> that provides an identity that enables the authentication of an endpoint by other endpoints exchanging messages with it.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.IdentityElement"> </xref> ，它提供一个标识，进行身份验证的其他终结点与它交换消息的终结点标识。

trans-unit.source: Initializes this endpoint address with the content of the specified endpoint address.
trans-unit.target: 初始化指定的终结点地址的内容与此终结点地址。

trans-unit.source: endpointAddress is or empty.

Gets a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"></xref> instance that contains a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref> objects that can be attributes or <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> objects of this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"></xref>实例，其中包含一套<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref>可以是属性的对象或<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>此配置元素的对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"></xref> instance that contains a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref> objects that can be attributes or <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> objects of this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"> </xref>实例，其中包含一套<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref>可以是属性的对象或<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>此配置元素的对象。
